title: (2040) Rio Maior - 6B Avenida Paulo VI
description: Quiet place at night and on weekends. Safe and surrounded by sports facilities. Flat floor and if you park where indicated, you have a view of the stadium lawn. Next to a picnic area and the training center.

title: (2040) Rio Maior - 67 Avenida Doutor Mário Soares
title_short: (2040) Rio Maior - 67 Avenida Doutor Mário Soares
description: Quiet place at night and on weekends. Safe and surrounded by sports facilities. During school time, throughout the day, there is the normal movement of the students. Flat floor and if you park where indicated, you have a view of the stadium lawn.

title: (2040) Rio Maior - Avenida Doutor Mário Soares
title_short: (2040) Rio Maior - Avenida Doutor Mário Soares
description: Small parking at the indoor and outdoor pool. Normal street noise during the day, calm and lit at night. Pubelles, tap on a tennis court. No emptying! Toilets in the entrance area of the swimming pool. Intermarket 300m.

title: (2040-481) Asseiceira -
description: Nice picnic spot. 8 flat paved parking spaces. Water tap accessible with a long hose. On a very noisy country road, currently due to diversion.

title: (2040-133) Rio Maior - 39 Estrada das Salinas
description: Parking in Las Salinas, on the right side there is a parking lot in the shelter of the trees, with bathrooms. There is a restaurant nearby and small cabins that offer drinks and food. We arrived at the last minute and there was hardly anyone else. Recommended if you are in the Park and looking for a place to spend the night.

title: (2040) Rio Maior - 69 Estrada das Salinas
description:
Salinas de Rio Maior. Large gravel car park almost flat. 100m from the village, the saltworks and the shops. Very quiet night despite the proximity of the road, but not very busy at night.
Very typical village with its wooden houses and its very rare "terrestrial" saltworks. I also recommend the Solar do Sal Restaurant and its excellent Portuguese-style chicken at very moderate prices in a beautiful rustic setting. The owner is very friendly and speaks French. I recommend

title: (2040) Rio Maior - IC2
description: GasProCar Gasstation. Possibility to get foreign gas bottles filled. Filled our german bottle without problems.

title: (2040) Rio Maior - R. Principal
description: Slightly sloping parking lot, lots of space, quiet but hum of wind turbines following the wind.

title: (2040-153) Fráguas - R. Principal
description: Small picnic area with barbecue available and fountain with several drinking water taps. WC but which was locked today

title: (2040) - Rua dos Potes Mouros
description: Follow signs '' formacao prismaticos basalticos ''. Spot with beautiful view of the serra, very very quiet, at the foot of the volcanic rock with natural water source 50m before, and small lake hidden 200m. Shady all morning! Gravel road very passable!

title: (2040-460) São João da Ribeira - 2 Rua Francisco Farelo
title_short: (2040-460) São João da Ribeira - 2 Rua Francisco Farelo
description: Drinking water next to the fountain.

title: (2475) Benedita - 20 Rua do Lapeirão
description: Large park, for travelers, truckers to park for rest or sleep. Restaurant / cafe open 24/24, with WC and free shower for guests. The property has a bakery. The park has charging stations for electric cars (Tesla and communes).

title: (2040) - 33 Rua São Francisco de Assis
description: In the heart of the Serras de Aire e Candeeiros Natural Park, the Chãos-Alcobertas Service Área offers parking and overnight status for 5 motorhomes, as well as water and energy supply, loading and unloading and cleaning services for 1 vehicle. It is locate in a calm and pleasant place, with a Picnic área, set in a unique landscape. In the área you have access to 4 walking routes and a wide range of cultural and leisure activities. In the surroundings there is also a panoramic restaurant.

title: (2040) Malaqueijo - 17 Rua dos Combatentes do Ultramar
title_short: (2040) Malaqueijo - 17 Rua dos Combatentes do Ultramar
description: Picnic area in the village next to a cafe and a playground for small children. Place is under trees.

title: (2040-536) Assentiz - 2 Rua da Fonte
description: Source of natural water and can fill bottles with water

title: (2550-012) Alguber - R. Mapril Fogaca
description: Flat free parking, a lot of space in a magical small village

title: (2040-015) Alcobertas - Rua do Olho de Água
title_short: (2040-015) Alcobertas - Rua do Olho de Água
description: Nice picnic area with grills and sinks for washing dishes. In the building next door you'll find the toilets (didn't check if they were open. It's possible to stop even long campers, but parking is slanted.

title: (2475-150) Benedita - 207 Rua da Fábrica da Sola
title_short: (2475-150) Benedita - 207 Rua da Fábrica da Sola
description: Flat parking, in the parking lot of the municipal swimming pool. Calm at night. On Saturday evening some young people, but without problem.

title: (2475-126) Benedita - 23 Rua 16 de Maio
description: Only vehicles up to 3500kg.  Free parking spaces on a tree-lined road.  Adjacent to a beautiful children's playground, small square, garden with benches.  On the other side of the gas station self-service washing machines with free wifi.  At 5 minutes walking distance from the center.

name: HERDADE DA HERA
title: (2065) HERDADE DA HERA
description:
Herdade da Hera:
Tourism and leisure area. Farm animals, organic gardens, comun kitchen and living room... Our door is closed because the animals are loose on the place. You have a doorbell on the gate. Wish you a wonderful trip!

title: (2025-045) Alcanede - 8A Rua Manuel Alves Frazão
description: Very quiet spot next to the castle possible to visit it because the door is just blocked with a stone and Roman bridge a hundred meters away and another car park downstairs with 50 places

title: (2025) Tremês - 17 Rua de Santiago
description: Free Water and air for the tires available, next to a bakery, cafe, gas station and car wash

title: () - Rua do Barreiro
description: Nature, panorama and tranquility! Corner to explore! Other places surely as nice as this one, chosen at random when leaving the summit route. Worth a visit for the villages with countless small stone walls characteristic of the place. In the heights of the natural park with magnificent views of the plains and surely on the Nazaré Sea (for us covered by a cloud bank in the distance). The site is at the entrance to one of the park's hikes, and has a pretty stone vestige and two uninhabited houses (one of which is open to the winds) in the middle of the pines. Not a cat in the middle of August, seems very little frequented (the foot!). Windy, very pleasant in hot weather, a little less on an evening of bad weather.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: This is a nice place to have a lunch. And see the Ribatejo

title: (2550-368) DaMinhaCasa Park - Cadaval - Rua fonte do Telheiro - Murteira
title_short: (2550-368) DaMinhaCasa Park - Cadaval - Rua fonte do Telheiro - Murteira
description: Country house with a beautiful view of the Montejunto mountain, offers parking for motorhomes, caravans and tents. Allows contact with nature: space with animals such as chickens and goats. Possibility to purchase homemade products such as cheese, eggs and bread. Our motto is: "Happiness is in the simple things"

title: (2550) Cadaval - 20 Rua das Castanholas
description: Nice launderette, free WiFi available. Nearby is a park with playground.

title: (2510) Óbidos - Estrada da Navalha e Fraldeu
title_short: (2510) Óbidos - Estrada da Navalha e Fraldeu
description: Quiet place by the lake and surrounded by nature. Access through a gravel road but in reasonable condition (maybe a bit muddy during the rainy season)

title: (2510) Gaeiras - IP6
description: Just behind the convent of Sao Miguel (seems oddly abandoned despite recent outdoor installations). Several places in the shade of trees. Water, tables, artisanal barbecue (provide grill). Easy access. Proximity to Obidos. There are some spaces to park also between trees for a sprinter. Bit of noise from the highway. Mountain bike singletrack trails within 5 minutes on the smaller dirt tracks down towards the barragem.

title: (2540) Carvalhal - Rua Senhor Jesus
description: Nice picnic spot by a church, just a little further down the road opposite a restaurant at a bend there is a much larger area with many tables where an overnight seems possible and lots of shade.

title: (2005) - Autoestrada do Norte
description: Simple subdivision with its parking spaces in a deserted artisanal area that has never found its customers. Valid for resting only with a slight noise from the motorway at night, intensifying with the traffic in the morning. Illuminated at night, no car passing. The places are flat or almost with a cycle track and pedestrian that the grass tries to take again…. Very large motorhomes can park without problem. No shade in summer.

title: (2005) - N365
description: Water source to top up. don't know if it's drinkable

name: Le Jasmin Etoilé
title: (2070-352) Le Jasmin Etoilé
description: 2-3 places for camper or caravan. Water, electricity, cassette and gray water evacuation, sink. Shops nearby: grocery store, fruit and vegetables, bar. Once a week: butcher and fishmonger. Cash machine. Pets accepted. If booking a minimum of one week, we take you to the supermarket for free for your purchases. Possibility to rent a kitchen tent with two pieces of furniture and an induction hob for a minimum of one week.

title: (2540) Bombarral -
description: (ASA de BOMBARRAL) - free service area with overnight parking for ten motorhomes (some shadows, others not) about 200 m behind the hypermarket Modelo/Continente. Quiet and safe place, with 250 m flat pedestrian access to city center (crossing railway line) and traditional grossery and municipal market. Several supermarkets around, municipal forest in city, tourist office, railway station (line to Lisboa), municipal museum, library and theater; kart race. In surrounding, ex-libris garden “Jardim Buddha Éden", in Quinta dos Louridos farm (to which there is also pedestrian access from parking through two trails and agricultural fields. Several wine farms (Quintas dos Louridos, do Sanguinhal, das Cerejeiras and da Granja) where taste is possible. Feel at home and in a family atmosphere!...

title: (2550) Ariero - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful panoramic views, 600m up, the highest point nearby by far, you can enjoy the sunrise and sunset next to the 18th century chapel, an old point of pilgrimage that still attracts visitors today. It's right next to a vast amount of antennas (ref highest point for miles), doesn't bother us but It'd look nicer without them. Opportunity to hike or bike to surrounding areas, no shade or services, easy road access, lots of space with relatively flat parking.

title: () Caldas da Rainha - 77 Estrada Nacional 8
description: LPG gas. Very very cheap! And a lovely owner. It’s at the back of the warehouses so don’t be put off!

description: Parking lot of the Praia Fluvial Olhos D'Agua in an olive grove. Shady and flat places available. You have to try something out. At Praia Fluvial, which is about 3 minutes from the parking lot, there are toilets, cold showers, trash cans, a bar / restaurant and tent camping next to the river bath. There are no facilities at the parking lot itself. A road leads past the parking lot and is also used at night. It can be noisy at the weekend, as the Praia is very busy in summer. Unfortunately there is rubbish everywhere.

description: Large, paved parking lot at Parque Aquatico Santatrem. Indoor pool open 10am - 7pm. Large outdoor area only from June to September. Stayed 2-3 days, no service except dumpsters. Very quiet at night, otherwise swimming. Parking space for AC planned.

title_short: (2460) Alcobaça - Rua Doutor Eduíno Borges Garcia
description: Parking next to the Alcobaça market, and very close to the historic center. It has no services. You can sleep well at night, there are shadows, and even some green space. The tourist post indicated that we could spend the night here. Saturday morning there is market next door, prepare to wake up at night while riding it ..

title: () Alcobaça -
description: Laundromat 300m up towards the modern buildings. Choradqueira next door.

title: (2480) São Bento - Rua Luís de Camões
title_short: (2480) São Bento - Rua Luís de Camões
description: Free parking area above the town with 6 individually laid out bays. Each bay is fully serviced with electricity, water and drainage (electricity and water not working on our visit probably because the aire has only recently opened, November 2019).Lovely area, very quiet.

title: (2580) - 1 Largo Doutor Mário Madeira
description: Water tap and public toilets in the center of cute tiny town of Ota. Opposite a nice café.

title: (2460) Alcobaça - 27 Rua Professor Engenheiro Joaquim Vieira Natividade
title_short: (2460) Alcobaça - 27 Rua Professor Engenheiro Joaquim Vieira Natividade
description: Free parking, both sides of the road

title: (2460) Alcobaça - Rua Dom Afonso de Albuquerque
title_short: (2460) Alcobaça - Rua Dom Afonso de Albuquerque
description: Laundromat in the gallery of Intermarché

title: (2500) Nadadouro - 160 Rua Engenheiro Luís de Paiva e Sousa
title_short: (2500) Nadadouro - 160 Rua Engenheiro Luís de Paiva e Sousa
description: Small grassy corner under the pines, near picnic area with toilets. View on the lagoon. Road ahead but very busy in the evening, very quiet night.

address.street: 160 Rua Engenheiro Luís de Paiva e Sousa

title: (2460) Alcobaça - 33 Rua Professor Engenheiro Joaquim Vieira Natividade
title_short: (2460) Alcobaça - 33 Rua Professor Engenheiro Joaquim Vieira Natividade
description: Motorhome area with services. Don't recommend filling up with drinking water as there is only one tap right over the black water disposal and probably being also used for rinsing cassettes. There are more water fountains in the area, but the taps have been removed.

address.street: 33 Rua Professor Engenheiro Joaquim Vieira Natividade

title: (2580) - Rua das Carreiras
description: Parking above the village of Ota, beautiful 180 ° view, many picnic tables, a barbecue area and several water taps (2/3 of closed at this time). Ideal for a quiet alte quiet.

title: (2530) Reguengo Grande - 3 Rua do Cemitério
description: Prices

title: (2460) Alcobaça - 29 Rua Mariana Coelho Bernardo
description: Boutique Cruz de Cristo, Camping-Gaz dealer who has stock of references 907 and 904 and small 400gr

title: (2530) Reguengo Grande - 26 N247-1
description: Service area in Reguengo Grande village, Lourinhã county, offers free full service for maintenance, located in the Town Picnic Park. Interesting to visit the "Ishmael Tasca" bar where is served the best “ginginha” (cerise liquor) of the region.

title: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - 1 Rua Primeiro de Maio
title_short: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - 1 Rua Primeiro de Maio
description: Has a fireplace

title: (2510-662) - Unnamed Road
description: Access possible by camper even nasturtium, super spot in nature

title: (2510) Óbidos - Rua da Nau
description: Parking at lagoon. Overnight possible. No facilities. Boarding place for kitesurfing and kite surfing lessons. Access road last part is paved dirt road.

name: Parque de Campismo Orbitur Foz de Arelho.
title: (2500) Parque de Campismo Orbitur Foz de Arelho.
title_short: (2500) Parque de Campismo Orbitur Foz de Arelho.
description: Camping site near the Lagoon. 3 min by car. with pool and bar. Lovely camping Place for tents. Electricity 4 euro. 2 adults and 1 car around 23 euro

title: (2000) - A1
description: Free park dedicated to Motorhomes or vancampers, low noise because of location far from A1.

title: (2450-027) Famalicão - Unnamed Road
description: Crossroads of forest road; a little dirty, 0 passage, spots on the sides possible for sleeping. Access for a van, can help out for 1 night, helped us out for the shower.

name: Campo de Futebol da Bezerra
title: (2480) Campo de Futebol da Bezerra
description: It is a place at the start of the Ecopista walk. There is a playground and a football field. It is outdated on the one hand, but the facilities for motorhomes seem very new. There are toilets but they are closed. There is also a place to bbq, but no idea if that can be used. Water works. Everything for free.

title: (2510) - Unnamed Road
description: At the edge Bras de l'Océan. Very nice view and extremely quiet. After the restaurant follow the path for about 2 kms.

title: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - 122 Praceta José Mourão
title_short: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - 122 Praceta José Mourão
description: Quiet place,near at the beach and the center of city

title: (2510) Casalinho - 1 Rua da Nau
description: Beautiful and quiet location by the lake. Easy to access via an unpaved road, including for motorhomes.

title: (2510-662) Amoreira - Rua da Nau
description: Parking space by the water. Not a nice beach unfortunately, lots of large pebbles and water plants. A great beach for kite surfing! And a nice view over the bay of Obidos!

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 2 Rua Encosta do Reivas
title_short: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 2 Rua Encosta do Reivas
description: Hardly parking, without services. quiet day and night

title: (2500) Nadadouro -
description: It's a great place with a beautiful view of the water, I parked my valve on the lawn and I was able to sleep in peace

title: (2510-662) - Unnamed Road
description: Splendid place with a superb view and surrounded by nature. You will be here at the foot of the water with beautiful trees for more privacy. There is a track for this walk or bike ride. Thank you for respecting the places and taking your waste as you knew the brought.

name: Parque de Campismo Baía Azul
title: (2460) Parque de Campismo Baía Azul
description:
Camping Baia Azul S. Martinho Porto
Near beach and city. Very good

title: (2510) Amoreira - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet night near the pontoon at the bottom of the restaurant (WiFi) which opens at 10am. Some passages until 8 p.m. of walkers. The restaurant is closed from 3 p.m. so no discomfort in the evening.

title: (2510) Vau - EM573
description: Nice place near a restaurant ideal for the night. Near the calm sea.

title: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - Avenida Marginal
title_short: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - Avenida Marginal
description: Parking allowed day and night. You can hardly park anywhere anymore, but here is a sign for the end of the RV parking ban. We have slept one night and without problem. Room for about 20.

title: (2500) Salir do Porto - 55 Estrada Atlântica
description:
Grill and water fountain available. quiet place to refill your motorhome . 
tables available. no black water drain available.

title: (2460-096) São Martinho do Porto - 16 Rua da República
title_short: (2460-096) São Martinho do Porto - 16 Rua da República
description: We shared the place with another AC in this residential area. Quit, near from the beach and all the restaurants.

title: (2500) Salir do Porto - 42 Rua Professor Montenegro
title_short: (2500) Salir do Porto - 42 Rua Professor Montenegro
description: A very good place to pass by.

title: (2500-907) Salir do Porto - 5 Rua Coração de Jesus
title_short: (2500-907) Salir do Porto - 5 Rua Coração de Jesus
description: Very quiet cemetery parking lot at night. Distributor, games for children and trash cans nearby.

title: (2500) Salir do Porto - 7 Rua da Ponte
title_short: (2500) Salir do Porto - 7 Rua da Ponte
description: We stayed there for several nights without any problem. Very calm and flat.

name: Lagoa de Óbidos
title: (2510) Lagoa de Óbidos
description: Small parking at the beginning of a footpath or mountain bike. Shady. Nice view of the lagoon. A trash can available. No service. Bad side for the sunset. No prohibition sign. Attention agitated night because background music in the distance that disturbs the tranquility ...

title: (2565-587) Outeiro da Cabeça - 1 Rua do Pavilhão Gimnodesportivo
title_short: (2565-587) Outeiro da Cabeça - 1 Rua do Pavilhão Gimnodesportivo
description: Small area for 2 motorhomes to not be tight, not very nice, but free with the classic services, water by tap push and small flow.

title: (2500) Salir do Porto - 10 Rua Padre Frazão
title_short: (2500) Salir do Porto - 10 Rua Padre Frazão
description: Tap. there are quite a few in the area but this one allows you to park really close. the jet can be very powerful which makes it possible to fill cans very quickly. ours (30L each) could be filled there. taller ones it will certainly be more complicated because you have to lift them.

title: (2500-909) Salir do Porto - 20 Rua Humberto Delgado
title_short: (2500-909) Salir do Porto - 20 Rua Humberto Delgado
description: Public Fountain

description: Public Fountain

title_short: (2500) Salir do Porto - 4 Rua do Ultramar
description: Public Fountain

title: (2080) Almeirim - Unnamed Road
description: Good place for fishing or discovering the places or simply for a quiet night's sleep no service.

title: (2500-685) Salir do Porto - 50 Rua Dom Fernando
title_short: (2500-685) Salir do Porto - 50 Rua Dom Fernando
description: The parking lot had services that are no longer maintained. No more emptying, no more toilets. There is still a drinking water tap. Motorhome parking €10. car 4€. Advantage: Quiet, far from the noise of the disco and right next to the big sand dune.

title: (2460-654) São Martinho do Porto - 49 Rua Doutor Rafael Gagliardini Graça
title_short: (2460-654) São Martinho do Porto - 49 Rua Doutor Rafael Gagliardini Graça
description: Laundry, very clean space, friendly people

title: (2510) Vau - Poça Pequena
description: Parking directly on the beach. In the evening and in the morning a few fishermen are there with their cars. Kitespot directly on site. You should not drive too far, the water can come in the flat part almost to the crossing bike path.

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho - Lagoa de Óbidos
title_short: (2500) Foz do Arelho - Lagoa de Óbidos
description: Small parking lot right on the lagoon of Foz do Arelho.

title: (2500-500) Foz do Arelho - 42 N360
description: Laundry self service. Some shops nearby.

name: Casa HNobre
title: (2000-736) Casa HNobre
description:
Private place to park a Van or Motorhome (<6m and 2m high) day 
or night. Water and electricity provided. 
Free WiFi. 
Swimming pool.
Wonderful sunset to enjoy and relax.

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 45 Rua Joaquim Frutuoso
title_short: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 45 Rua Joaquim Frutuoso
description: The parking lot is on a quiet street with little traffic. No prohibition signs and little traffic noise made for a relaxing night!

title: (2460) - IC2
description: Park for trucks, 24 hours dinner and serviço, with showers. in the gás station

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 43 Rua Francisco Almeida Grandela
title_short: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 43 Rua Francisco Almeida Grandela
description: Parking for the night next to the football stadium, and the children's playground. Quiet at night.

name: Parque de Campismo Colina do Sol
title: (2460) Parque de Campismo Colina do Sol
title_short: (2460) Parque de Campismo Colina do Sol
description:
Freshly opened campsite in May 2023 after renovation.

Very nice location, 15 mins walk to the beach and well equipped with swimming pool, basketball court, playground, etc.

title: () Almeirim - Unnamed Road
description: Natural area at the edge of Rio Tejo. Trees limit access to smaller sizes (height width).

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho - Largo Francisco Sá Carneiro - Lagoa de Óbidos
title_short: (2500) Foz do Arelho - Largo Francisco Sá Carneiro - Lagoa de Óbidos
description: Parking space for mobile homes with all facilities available. Located right on the lagoon. Places without electricity are common. The sanitary building is open during the day from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. The toilet block also contains 1 cold shower and 1 hot shower (keys for hot showers at the reception). Washing area with cold water, emptying of gray and black water and rubbish point is included in the price. The car park itself is well maintained with semi-paved areas (pebbles), some with shade. Many Portuguese who have been there for a long time, all very friendly. Bread is available in the morning from 8:00 in the Marisol bar, 100 m from the campsite. There are also many restaurants along the water.

address.street: Largo Francisco Sá Carneiro - Lagoa de Óbidos

title: (2000) Vale de Figueira - Unnamed Road
description: Shaded site at the end of a rural road with a source (uncontrolled) on the edge of a tributary of the Tagus

title: (2460-697) São Martinho do Porto - 1 Rua da Liberdade
title_short: (2460-697) São Martinho do Porto - 1 Rua da Liberdade
description: Drinking water. 1 inch connection

title: (2500) Salir do Porto - Unnamed Road
description: Great sand trail with lots of areas to camp beautiful views only accessible by 4x4 or a van if you get stuck lower tire pressure

title: (2500) Salir do Porto - Unnamed Road
description: Accessible place except camping car but 4 * 4 or car is good! Ocean view breathtaking. The floor is however not flat everywhere but it is possible to find a corner where to settle for the night. It is very quiet. Before going on the unpaved road that leads to this place there is a parking with a shower, which can be useful.

title: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - Caminho da Gralha
title_short: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - Caminho da Gralha
description: A spectacular place. Incredible views. Access not very complicated. Prohibited at night, frequent police checks.

title: (2565) Ramalhal - 14 Rua das Figueiras
description: drinking water fountain

title: (2500) Salir do Porto - Unnamed Road
description: Spot with incredible ocean view. Magnificent sunset. On the left of the track, uneven access (holes) but we got there without problems in a 2x4 car. No convenience, nothing but nature and you. Truly sublime!

title: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - Praia da Gralha
title_short: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - Praia da Gralha
description: Access by road (4x4 not necessary but VERY steep). When I arrived there were 4 campers: 2 occupying the sand of the same beach and 2 very bulky campers, occupying the place of 4 cars. I think it would be more respectful not to park on the beach (do it in the parking lot that is 6 meters higher) and park optimizing the parking space, even if you don't have the same views from the kitchen of your camper. Avoid camping with tables, awnings...etc.

title: (2480) Alvados -
description: Ample space to park for the night for multiple RVs/vans. Quiet spot with no homes in sight and an amazing lookout over the valley below. The only building nearby is the ticket office for the Alvado caves.

title: (2500) - Atlântica
description: Picnic area with tables and benches, water point, point of view on sea and cliff. We stayed there, very little passing after sunset.

title: (2500) Salir do Porto - Unnamed Road
description: Spot accessible by 4x4 with high cell. Magnificent view of the ocean and wild nature. Departure from the paths and trails for walking and / or mountain biking to discover the mouth of the splendid Bay of Sao Martinho do Porto and its Chapel renovated in 2020.

title: (2500) Salir do Porto -
description: ✔️ peaceful spot ✔️ amazing sea view                     ✔️ no signs of police control (low season)            ✔️ parking space for 2 cars

title: (2500) - Atlântica
description: Small place for one van by the sea with nice views and great sunsets. The access is a little tricky and is not recomended for anything bigger than a small camper, 4x4 would be better and If you do not have one do not go further down to the last platform as there is a large rock that will be difficult to get back over. No services just peace, when the wind is not to strong.

title: (2510) Leiria - 3 EM573
description: Ample parking also for long campers. there is the autocarros sign but no prohibition. spent a quiet night and a beautiful day at the beach. public toilets, beach showers and restaurants just below

title: (2510-661) Distrito de Leiria - 2 EM573
description: Showers and drinking water

title: (2480-034) Alvados - Unnamed Road
description:
Park place next to the Alvados grotto. It is not specific for van but you can park for a quit night and no one will say anything. In the morning you can visit the grotto. 
you have a nice view to the mountains.

title: (2500-483) Foz do Arelho - 2 Rua Monte do Facho
title_short: (2500-483) Foz do Arelho - 2 Rua Monte do Facho
description: Dead end street. we can put a motorhome 6m.

title: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - Estrada do Facho
title_short: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - Estrada do Facho
description: Wonderful place with spectacular sea views. There are always tourists coming by. No toilets or trash cans.

title: (2500) - Atlântica
description: Panorama on the coast, wild place, easily accessible by a dirt track. Very quiet place, perfect for the night. You can walk down to the sea, but no easy access to water (only rocks)

title: (2500-481) Foz do Arelho -
description: Very easy to access, sea view, sandy beach within walking distance. 3 days for us in peace. A few walkers and fishermen. Please keep the place clean

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho -
description: At the end of a small path, a small place to land and turn around, even with a large motorhome. Access to a small deserted beach. By walking 5 minutes. Magnificent sunset.

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho - Atlântica
description: Landing at the end of a path, for 4x4 or van only, too complicated for camper. 1 see 2 places tight. Tranquility assured and a breathtaking view with sunset. Superb !!

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 2 Rua Visconde Morais
title_short: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 2 Rua Visconde Morais
description: Good usable space in the off-season. In high season you can shower here in cabins or outside in the open air (both free of charge) don't know if the showers are also open in low season.

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 6B Rua Visconde Morais
title_short: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 6B Rua Visconde Morais
description: Very nice parking lot. Quiet environment overlooking the Atlantic. Could stay there without problems. Access very easy, because right next to a very busy street.

title: (2500) Boavista -
description: Viewpoint accessible via a dirt road. Ok For panel vans and smaller vehicles. limited width. View of the Atlantic, very quiet.

title: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - 3 Rua Praia do Salgado
title_short: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - 3 Rua Praia do Salgado
description: Spot nature facing the village of Nazaré. In board so windy side.
